title: Sampler, 19th century
medium: Medium: silk embroidery, glass beads, linen foundation
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 25 x 34 cm (9 13/16 x 13 3/8 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Six narrow bands of florals. Two bands unfinished. Approximately half of sampler is covered by beadwork.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk embroidery, glass beads, linen foundation. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-135.
